title: Project Cores
body: Are there any more ways to get project cores other than using RP for Augmented chests? I have 14 cores and I need 18 because 7 for the Ekko border and 11 for the Yasuo skin shard. Also, I have 2 augmented fragments which is annoying me because I only need one more. If there aren't any more ways to get project cores what should I choose?

replies.body: Did you grab the Disruption cache that came out today? I'm assuming you did because you mention the Yasuo skin shard, but I thought I'd ask just in case.

Got it. So other than spending RP to purchase augmented caches to get more PROJECT cores, there's no way to get more at this point. I really like the PROJECT Yasuo skin, but if you're an Ekko main, you may want to unlock that loading border since it's a limited item. 

Let me know if you have any questions~

at this point..... so in the future there will be a way, just with IP? or something to receive in the store with IP would be great. I always am sitting on tons of IP that isnt used, this Core deal was a good idea with the purchase of IP also
